name: FlixMobility
membership:
Bunderverband Deutscher Omnibusunternehmer (bdo), Deutscher Tourismusverband (DTV), Internationaler Bustouristik Verband (RDA)
International Road Transport Union (IRU)
goal: FlixMobility is a young mobility provider that has been changing the way millions of people travel in Europe since 2013 via its FlixBus brand. As a unique combination of tech-startup, e-commerce platform and transportation company, FlixBus quickly became Europe’s largest intercity bus network, helping over 100 million people reach their destinations. In 2018, FlixTrain was launched, expanding this service into the rail industry. Thanks to a user-friendly booking system and extensive daily route network, FlixMobility offers travelers the opportunity to experience the world no matter their budget. Our green buses and long-distance trains comply with the highest safety and environmental standards, so that we can offer a sustainable, convenient and comfortable alternative to private transportation.
euInitiatives: Regulation 1073 on access to the international market for bus and coach services
